ygData.subject: Re: More Robe Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to Befallen and get some Demask robes...  or if you can...  hit that Tharmateurgist (spelling?) and get his (Gossmer I think, maybe he just has the brown
ygData.messageBody:
Go to Befallen and get some Demask robes... or if you can... hit that Tharmateurgist (spelling?) and get his (Gossmer I think, maybe he just has the brown robes though... either is better than guild robes.)

Couple more levels... group with a few higher levelers and hit Najere for Flowing black... ;)

Drev

> Fluke
